column1: Jp

ちょうどお前に話したいことが――
――いや、戦況については
ジョゼフから聞いているぞ
column2:
There's something I wanted to talk to you about-
-Actually, I've already heard about
the battle situation from Joseph.

column1:
それを踏まえた上で
オレからも伝えたいことがある
竜の力を帯びた武具"について、だ"
column2:
With that in mind, 
I also have something to share. 
It's about the "equipment imbued 
with dragon's power."

column1: 竜の力を帯びた武具"
――"竜武具"を鍛える方法について
ずいぶん調べてみた
お前にも、わかったことを話しておきたい"
column2:
About the 
"equipment imbued with dragon's power"...
I've done quite a bit of research on how to forge 
"Dragon Arms." 
I want to share what I've discovered with you.

column1:
まずは強化だが――
これについては、オレよりもソニアが詳しい
詳しい者に任せた方がいいだろう
column2:
First, about enhancements...
Sonia knows more than I do about this. 
Better leave it to the expert.

column1:
なに、ソニアは良いポーンだ
多少複雑な武具だろうと
これまで通り上手くやってくれるはずだ
column2:
Indeed, Sonia is a reliable pawn. 
Regardless of how intricate 
the gear might be, she'll 
manage it just like before.

column1:
次に、強化に使う素材だ
武具を手に入れた場所には、武具と同じように
竜の力を帯びた素材があるはずだ
こいつを集めればいい
column2:
Next, materials for enhancement.
Where you found the arms, there
should be materials imbued with
dragon's power, just like them.
Gather these.

column1:
素材を集めるには、もうひとつ方法がある
それが資源分解"だ――
竜の力を帯びた武具が余っていたら
オレのところに持ってきてくれ"
column2:
There's another way to gather
materials - "Equipment Disassembly".
If you have spare arms imbued
with dragon's power, bring them
to me.

column1:
そいつを分解して素材に変えてやることができる
少々荒っぽいが、多少は負担が減るはずだ
column2:
I can break it down and turn it into
materials. It may be a bit rough, but it
should ease the burden somewhat.

column1: 最後に、竜の力を帯びた防具"の生産について――
これは、数は必要だが素材さえあれば作ってやれる
どうしても足りない防具ってのが出てくるだろう
そういう要望にも応えるから、遠慮はするな"
column2:
Finally, about producing "defensive equipment"
with dragon's power - I can craft
it given enough materials, though
quantities are large. When you
face shortages, don't hesitate
to request my services.

column1: 竜の力を帯びた武器"の生産については
ソニアに任せるとしよう
オレが一手に引き受けるには
少々荷が重い"
column2:
As for the production of "weapons" imbued 
with dragon power, I will leave that to 
Sonia. It's a bit too much for me to take 
on entirely by myself.

column1:
――む、一息に話しすぎたか？
ジョゼフのやつに話が長いと言われて
気を付けたつもりだったんだがな
column2:
—Ah, have I been rambling too long? 
I meant to be cautious since Joseph 
commented on my long-windedness.

column1: 竜の力を帯びた武具"を
強化するための素材を得るには
武具を得た場所で拾ってくるか
そういった武具を"資源分解"するかだ"
column2:
To obtain materials for enhancing 
equipment imbued with dragon's power, 
you can either gather them from the 
location where you acquired the equipment 
or break down such weapons through 
"Equipment Disassembly."

column1: 竜の力を帯びた防具"を生産したいなら
素材を揃えてくれれば、オレが作ってやれる"
column2:
If you want to forge armor with the 
power of dragons, just collect the 
materials, and I will craft it for 
you.

column1: だが、強化や武器"の生産については
ソニアに聞いてくれ
彼女は良いポーンだ
きっと上手く手配してくれる"
column2:
That said, for enhancements and weapon 
production, talk to Sonia. She is a 
reliable pawn who will manage it well.

column1:
何だ、急ぎの用でもあるのか？
一刻も早く伝えた方が良いと思ったんだが――
用が済んだら、また声をかけてくれ
column2:
Ah, pressing matters elsewhere?
I believed this required swift
attention - return when your
current business concludes.

column1:
ええ、話は伺っております
竜の力を帯びた素材があれば
特殊な武具を強化することもできましょう
column2:
Yes, I understand what you mean. 
If you possess materials with the 
power of dragons, we can strengthen 
special weapons too.

column1:
強化することで、武具に秘められていた
竜の力を引き出す――といったことも可能なはずです
column2:
Through enhancement, we can 
unlock the dragon's hidden 
power sealed within the 
weapons, allowing its use.

column1:
武具と素材が集まった際には
ぜひともクラフトルームへおいでください
私たちポーンも、その時を心待ちにしております
column2:
Once you have gathered the 
equipment and materials, do 
make your way to the craft 
room. We pawns look forward 
to that moment as well.
